testCases.explanation: The zero breaks any product. Max product is 0 (subarray [0]).
Single element -2 is the only subarray; maximum product is -2.

description:
Solve the **Maximum Product Subarray** problem.

Given an integer array nums, find the contiguous subarray (containing at least one number) with the largest product and return the product.

See the full problem description on [LeetCode](https://leetcode.com/problems/maximum-product-subarray/).

examples.explanation: Zero element limits max product to 0.

constraints: The product of any prefix or suffix of nums is guaranteed to fit in a 32-bit integer
